scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run accounts" "npm run orders" "npm run products" "npm run admin-app" "npm run vendor-app" "npm run shopper-app"  "npm run vendor-api"
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-vendor && npm run ci-admin && npm run ci-shopper && npm run ci-accounts && npm run ci-orders && npm run ci-products
scripts.install: npm install concurrently && npm run install-vendor && npm run install-admin && npm run install-shopper && npm run install-accounts && npm run install-orders && npm run install-products && npm run install-vendor-api
scripts.build: npm run build-vendor && npm run build-admin && npm run build-shopper && npm run build-accounts && npm run build-orders && npm run build-products && npm run build-vendor-api
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-vendor" "npm run start-vendor-api" "npm run start-admin" "npm run start-shopper" "npm run start-accounts" "npm run start-orders" "npm run start-products"
scripts.test: npm run test-accounts && npm run test-products && npm run test-orders
scripts.test-accounts: cd AccountService && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test-orders: cd OrderService && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test-products: cd ProductService && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test-vendor: cd vendor-app && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test-admin: cd admin-app && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test-shopper: cd shopper-app && npm run build && npm test
scripts.package: docker build . -t cbe-linux-amd64 --platform linux/amd64 && docker save -o cbe-linux-amd64.tar cbe-linux-amd64
